channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟡 12:39 Repulse threat of artillery shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Dnipropetrovsk Region
item.description: 🟡 12:39 Repulse threat of artillery shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Dnipropetrovsk Region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.
